entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as a character who has a conversation with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation and is being discussed by Dumbledore.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is a house at Hogwarts that is mentioned as having a connection to Parseltongue and Harry.

entities.name: parseltongue
entities.description: Parseltongue is a language spoken by Salazar Slytherin and Voldemort, which Harry can also speak.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who gave Harry his scar and transferred some of his powers to him.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character who has a conversation with Harry and explains the connection between Slytherin and Parseltongue.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is a house at Hogwarts that is mentioned as being where Harry was sorted.

relationships.description: Harry has qualities prized by Salazar Slytherin, and the Sorting Hat could see Slytherin's power in him.
Voldemort transferred some of his powers to Harry the night he gave him his scar.
Dumbledore is giving advice to Harry about his connection to Slytherin and Parseltongue.
